properties.areaDesc: Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 13 at 3:45AM MST until February 14 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Missoula MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches
above 4000 feet. Below 4000 feet 1 to 4 inches of snow
accumulation.

* WHERE...Elk River, Highway 11 Pierce to Headquarters, Pierce,
Dixie, Elk City, and Highway 12 Lowell to Lolo Pass.

* WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 5 PM PST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 PM PST FRIDAY
